answers.answer: Swelling in the face and hands and headaches can be signs of preeclampsia. I would call your OB/midwife and express your concerns. Have you had any issues with high blood pressure before in your pregnancy?
I think you should ring your doctor hun...swelling in the hands and face isn't a good thing...
I havent had any blood pressure issues before.

I agree call your Dr. and they will inform you what to do. I have heard swelling in the face is concerning. Legs and feet are normal. Also you could go to a store/pharmacy and use the machine to check your blood pressure. Then you will know to tell your Dr. what your pressure is at. Good luck, and keep us informed.
You need to report to l&d those are signs of preclampsia. When you get l&d they will contact your Dr.
My doctor is having me come in at 230.

question: Im have 31 days left. And here recently my heart & ribs have been hurting and i have a headache that is so bad i cant sleep at night, and my hole face hurts. My face, feet and hands are swollen. has anyone else had this?
title: has anyone else
